title.rendered: STEDI HOLDEN COLORADO, COLORADO 7 RG & TRAILBLAZER PIGGY BACK ADAPTER

content.rendered:
Holden Colorado RG Driving Light Piggy Back High Beam Adapter

DETAILS

Specifically designed to suit the Holden Colorado, Colorado 7 RG (2012+) & Trailblazer models.

The easy solution for wiring up your Driving Lights with no need for splicing, tapping, or soldering as it is a direct Plug & Play install.

Designed to work with all STEDI Quick Fit Wiring Harnesses.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

CONNECTOR TYPE 10 Pin
FITS COLORADO, COLORADO 7 & TRAILBLAZER 2012+

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x Holden Colorado RG High beam Adapter

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI HOLDEN COLORADO, COLORADO 7 RG & TRAILBLAZER PIGGY BACK ADAPTER

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
